Uses of Package
com.azure.messaging.eventhubs

  • Packages that use com.azure.messaging.eventhubs 
    Package Description
    com.azure.messaging.eventhubs
    Package containing classes for creating an EventHubClient or an EventHubAsyncClient to perform operations on Azure Event Hubs.
    com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.checkpointstore.blob
    Package containing implementation for PartitionManager that uses Storage blobs for persisting checkpoints and partition ownership details.
    com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models
    Package containing classes used for creating and configuring events that are being sent-to and received-from Azure Event Hubs service.
  • Classes in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs used by com.azure.messaging.eventhubs 
    Class and Description
    CloseReason
    Enumeration of all possible reasons a PartitionProcessor may be closed.
    EventData
    The data structure encapsulating the event being sent-to and received-from Event Hubs.
    EventDataBatch
    A class for aggregating EventData into a single, size-limited, batch.
    EventHubAsyncClient
    An asynchronous client that is the main point of interaction with Azure Event Hubs.
    EventHubAsyncConsumer
    A consumer responsible for reading EventData from a specific Event Hub partition in the context of a specific consumer group.
    EventHubAsyncProducer
    A producer responsible for transmitting EventData to a specific Event Hub, grouped together in batches.
    EventHubClient
    A synchronous client that is the main point of interaction with Azure Event Hubs.
    EventHubClientBuilder
    This class provides a fluent builder API to aid the instantiation of EventHubAsyncClient and EventHubClient.
    EventHubConsumer
    A consumer responsible for reading EventData from a specific Event Hub partition in the context of a specific consumer group.
    EventHubProducer
    A producer responsible for transmitting EventData to a specific Event Hub, grouped together in batches.
    EventHubProperties
    Holds information about an Event Hub which can come handy while performing operations like creating an EventHubConsumer or an EventHubAsyncConsumer.
    EventProcessor
    Event Processor provides a convenient mechanism to consume events from all partitions of an Event Hub in the context of a consumer group.
    EventProcessorBuilder
    This class provides a fluent builder API to help aid the configuration and instantiation of the EventProcessor.
    PartitionManager
    A partition manager stores and retrieves partition ownership information and checkpoint details for each partition.
    PartitionProperties
    A set of information for a single partition of an Event Hub.
  • Classes in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs used by com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.checkpointstore.blob 
    Class and Description
    PartitionManager
    A partition manager stores and retrieves partition ownership information and checkpoint details for each partition.
  • Classes in com.azure.messaging.eventhubs used by com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models 
    Class and Description
    EventData
    The data structure encapsulating the event being sent-to and received-from Event Hubs.
    PartitionManager
    A partition manager stores and retrieves partition ownership information and checkpoint details for each partition.
